applogic

Class Rotator

  • java.lang.Object
    • applogic.Rotator

  • public class Rotator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for rotating the Tetrimino pieces.

    • Method Detail

      • rotate

        public int[][] rotate(Rotation rotation,
                      int[][] matrixToBeRotated)
        Method for rotating the Tetrimino.
        Parameters:
        rotation - Direction of the rotation.
        matrixToBeRotated - Tetrimino container as int tableaux.
        Returns:
        Matrix that has been rotated.

      • getRotatedMatrix

        public int[][] getRotatedMatrix(Rotation rotation,
                                int[][] currentMatrix)
        Method to get the rotated matrix of the Tetrimino container.
        Parameters:
        rotation - Direction of the rotation.
        currentMatrix - Matrix that is to be rotated.
        Returns:
        int[][] tableauc that has been rotated.

      • rotateMatrixClockwise

        public void rotateMatrixClockwise(int[][] currentMatrix,
                                  int[][] newMatrix,
                                  int rowCount,
                                  int columnCount,
                                  int column)
        Rotates the position of the matrix that makes up the Tetrimino container clockwise.
        Parameters:
        currentMatrix - int[][] tableaux that is to be rotated.
        newMatrix - int[][] tableaux where the rotated tableuax objects are set.
        rowCount - number of rows that has been handled already.
        columnCount - number of columns that has been handled already.
        column - column that is to be handled.

      • rotateMatrixCounterclockwise

        public void rotateMatrixCounterclockwise(int[][] currentMatrix,
                                         int[][] newMatrix,
                                         int rowCount,
                                         int columnCount,
                                         int column)
        Rotates the position of the matrix that makes up the Tetrimino container counterclockwise.
        Parameters:
        currentMatrix - int[][] tableaux that is to be rotated.
        newMatrix - int[][] tableaux where the rotated tableuax objects are set.
        rowCount - number of rows that has been handled already.
        columnCount - number of columns that has been handled already.
        column - column that is to be handled.
